name: Chainsaw Man - Mayhem
description:
Experience a 2D action game, set in the world of Chainsaw Man, where Denji, a teenage devil hunter is set out to hunt for devils plaguing his world (not really lol).

*The game is early-early in development, and many core features of the game are missing.

**All characters belong to Tatsuki Fujimoto, the original author of Chainsaw Man.
